pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Acne Face Wash 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Face Wash for Acne with soothing chamomile provides a deep cleansing action, helps prevent acne and clear skin.

Tea Tree Face Wash for Acne deeps cleans without over-drying the skin. The natural, soap-free foaming cleanser helps prevent acne and pimples by gently cleansing the skin to remove the build up of excessive oils. Contains Tea Tree Oil to help control bacteria and Chamomile to soothe the skin, helping to keep skin clear.
For best results, use in conjunction with Thursday Plantation Tea Tree & Witch Hazel Toner and Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Face Cream as part of your everyday skin care regime.

Product Claims: Not tested on animals.

Size: 150mL

Fragrance: Tea Tree

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Soap-Free?: Yes

Ph Balanced?: Yes

PABA Free?: Yes

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Deep cleansing action
• Clears skin
• Helps prevent acne
• soap-free formula
• Contains 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil to help control bacteria
• Vegan.

Warnings

For external use only. Skin patch test prior to use. If sensitivity occurs, discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken skin. Keep out of reach of children.

CAUTION

For external use only. Skin patch test prior to use. If sensitivity occurs, discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken skin. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Coco-Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Alcohol,m Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Sodium Hydroxymethylglycinate, Eucalyptus Citriodora Oil, Limonene.

Directions

Wet face and work product into lather. Gently massage into skin, avoiding eyes and eye area. Rinse well and pat dry.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
